20101223020626.000|20101223020627.000|CC1|HUNDREDS OF RESIDENTS HAVE BEEN 
20101223020627.000|20101223020630.000|CC1|OUT OF THEIR HOMES AFTER A WALL 
20101223020630.000|20101223020634.000|CC1|OF THE SWOLLEN TRABUCO CANYON

20101223020646.000|20101223020647.000|CC1|COULD BREACH AND CAUSED MASSIVE 
20101223020647.000|20101223020647.000|CC1|FLOODING.

20101223020649.000|20101223020650.000|CC1|HEAVY EQUIPMENT.

20101223020656.000|20101223020658.000|CC1|RESIDENTS UNDER EVACUATION

20101223020659.000|20101223020700.000|CC1|SOME RESIDENTS HAVE DECIDED TO  
20101223020700.000|20101223020703.000|CC1|STAY PUT.

20101223020705.000|20101223020706.000|CC1|EVACUATE.

20101223020708.000|20101223020709.000|CC1|BURNED OUT AREA WHERE PEOPLE

20101223020713.000|20101223020715.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WE JUST SPOKE      
20101223020715.000|20101223020717.000|CC1|WITH EMERGENCY OFFICIALS TO TELL
20101223020717.000|20101223020718.000|CC1|US THEY ARE CAUTIOUSLY

20101223020719.000|20101223020721.000|CC1|CLEAR SKIES.

20101223020726.000|20101223020727.000|CC1|RESPONSES.

20101223020729.000|20101223020731.000|CC1|DEPUTIES OUR MONITORING THIS    
20101223020731.000|20101223020732.000|CC1|EVACUATION AREA CHECKING

20101223020745.000|20101223020748.000|CC1|CONSTANT RAIN, SUDDENLY         
20101223020748.000|20101223020751.000|CC1|INTENSIFIED INTO POWERFUL       
20101223020751.000|20101223020751.000|CC1|DOWNPOURS.                      
20101223020751.000|20101223020753.000|CC1|>> ROCKS COMING DOWN OFF OF THE

20101223020754.000|20101223020755.000|CC1|THEY ARE HITTING THE RAILROAD   
20101223020755.000|20101223020757.000|CC1|BUNKER BEHIND THE HOUSE.        
20101223020757.000|20101223020759.000|CC1|>> I DID NOT SLEEP MUCH.        
20101223020759.000|20101223020800.000|CC1|>> Reporter: LAST NIGHT DAWN    
20101223020800.000|20101223020802.000|CC1|AND HER FAMILY MADE THE DECISION
